verses.name: Leviticus 20:13
verses.text: If a man also lie with mankind, as he lieth with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination: they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.

verses.name: Leviticus 20:14
verses.text: And if a man take a wife and her mother, it is wickedness: they shall be burnt with fire, both he and they; that there be no wickedness among you.

verses.name: Leviticus 20:15
verses.text: And if a man lie with a beast, he shall surely be put to death: and ye shall slay the beast.
